definition: ukulele/simplified form also written 尤克里里琴

sentences.english: Lily Zhang works in the Marketing Department.
So the same evening the police detained the father of Li-Li then.
sentences.chinese: 于是当天晚上警方便将丽丽的父亲扣留。

sentences.english: It was fine today, Lily and I went to visit the Science Museum.
sentences.chinese: 今天是个好天气，我和丽丽去科技馆参观。

sentences.english: I am in Class Eight with Lily and Lucy.
Jane and her friend Lily are in Jane'sbedroom.
sentences.chinese: 娟和她的朋友丽丽在娟的卧室里。

sentences.english: Noble, elegant living, Lily in the head, Xinxin moved.
sentences.chinese: 高贵气质，典雅生活，丽丽在目，鑫鑫动容。

sentences.english: Lily and Lucy walked arm in arm.
sentences.chinese: 丽丽和露西手挽手地走着。

sentences.english: “It’s pretty lonely here, ” says a woman named Li Li, the marketing manager of an elegant restaurant in Kangbashi’s mostly vacant Lido Hotel.
sentences.chinese: “这里真的很荒凉”，丽都酒店的销售经理丽丽说。

sentences.english: Lily's brooch looks exquisite. It must be very precious.
sentences.chinese: 丽丽的胸饰很别致，看得出来是个名贵的东西。

sentences.english: Little Lily and little Nelly are writing letters.
sentences.chinese: 小丽丽和小奈利在写信。
丽丽是我门挨门的邻居。

sentences.english: John, I’d like you to meet ny friend Lily.
sentences.chinese: 约翰，来，我给你介绍一下我的朋友丽丽。

sentences.english: Lucy and Lili went shopping yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 露西和丽丽昨地下街去买东西。

sentences.english: Lily is going to Guangming Square.
Lily has a preference for pop songs by Zhang Xinzhe to those by any other.
sentences.chinese: 丽丽喜欢张信哲的流行歌曲胜过其他任何一个歌星。

definition: Nana (name)/Nana (1880 novel by Émile Zola)/Nana (Japanese manga series)
one of the three main divisions of the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经
Alian District, a rural district in Kaohsiung, Taiwan
big sister/elder sister/older sister (also polite term of address for a girl or woman slightly older than the speaker)
older female cousin via female line
(Tw) (Internet slang) Greetings! (used when it's unknown what time the reader will see one's post, or just to be cute)
